channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Dangerous flooding hits US Southeast as snow and frigid cold forecast for Northeast and Plains
item.description: Heavy rains and dangerous flooding have struck the Southeast U.S. as much of the East endured a renewed round of harsh, soggy weather, with at least one fatality reported in Kentucky.

item.title: Justice Department fires 20 immigration judges from backlogged courts amid major government cuts
How Presidents Day has evolved from reverence to retail
